title: Batman - Resurrection of Ra's al Ghul [BBN][h33t]
description:
10 Issue Story Arc

The Resurrection of Ra&#039;s al Ghul is the name of an eight issue comic book crossover affecting all the Batman titles of DC Comics. It involves the return of notable Batman villain Ra&#039;s al Ghul, and is his first appearance since his apparent death in Batman: Death and the Maidens in 2003. It also connects back to the Batman & Son storyline, which introduced Damian as the son of Batman and Talia al Ghul. On May 7, 2008, DC Comics will reprint the eight issues crossover as 256-pages hardcover volume collecting the intense tale originally presented in Batman Annual #26, Batman #670-671, Robin #168-169, Robin ANNUAL #7, Nightwing #138-139, and Detective Comics #838-839!

The seeds for the story were planted in 2007&#039;s Batman Annual #26, which added some more background to the origin story of Ra&#039;s. The same week the first issue of the story came out, Robin Annual #7 served as a jumping off point with an interlude starring Damian.[/quote]

BIG THANKS to all the scanners involved.

IF YOU LIKE THE BOOK, THEN BUY THE COMICS OR THE TRADES. SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL COMIC BOOK STORES AND THE INDEPENDENT PUBLISHERS!!!

Please keep seeding and enjoy! :D
